name: パーリーモンスター

lrc.surface: Yeah I'm gonna
give it to ya right now
Uh You gotta give it to me
right now
Yeah I gotta get ya get ya
right now
Baby If you're down with it
we can do it right now
I'm gonna drive you crazy,
drive you crazy, bady girl
You gotta rock your body,
rock your body, rock your world
Tonight's the night, this is
the party that you've never seen
Just come &follow me
So I can give you everything
Baby, baby 単調な日々から
(We're gonna run away
This is how we're gonna play)
Baby, baby 抜け出すのさ
(C'mon, everybody Turn it up)
僕らパーリーモンスター
ロック ロックしちゃいな
遊べEveryday
そうかませEvery right
声枯らしシャウトしようぜ
果てるまでCrazy
君もパーリーモンスター
バウンス バウンスしちゃえば?
踊れEveryday
そう飛びなEvery night
前代未聞なエクスタシーーーーー!!

words.surface: エクスタシーーーーー

lrc.surface: Yeah I'm gonna
give it to ya right now
Uh You gotta give it to me
right now
Yeah I gotta get ya get ya
right now
Baby If you're down with it
we can do it right now
So c'mon turn around &
turn around &upside down
You gotta shake ya body.
shake ya body, shake it now
Now let me hear you scream
just a little louder
Cuz this is how we do it,
party like a monster
Tricky Tricky 最高の刺激を
(So tell me how you feel
I can give you what you need)
Tricky Tricky 求めてる
(C'mon, everybody Let it go)
今日はパーリードンストップ
